segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster; it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink like a broken pipe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking everything, filthy puddle spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there, foot in the mess, polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she ignore the grime building up?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably next to get wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then the kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced on that rickety stool, inviting trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for a share, all sticky soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is unsanitary and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden outside can't clean this up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the sloppiness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to mop this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
